Yves Apollinaire Pede (a mụrụ ya n'afọ 1959, na Abomey ) bụ onye Beninois Vodou artist

Mgbe e nyechara ya ọrụ imepụta ihe osise maka Abomey Museum, o mere ihe osise ájá nke ndị a ma ama dịka Nelson Mandela O ji nwayọọ nwayọọ na-elekwasị anya na nka ákwà, na-achọ ndị mba Haitian nakwa mba Cuban Vodou artists maka mkpali

A makwaara ya maka nnukwu ihe ọkpụkpụ simenti ya na ihe osise ya, a na-ekwukwa na ọ nwere "mmasị pụrụ iche" na Kulito, okwu Fon nke pụtara n'ụzọ nkịtị "onye si n'ụzọ ọnwụ". Ọ bi na Ouidah, ụlọ ọrụ ụwa maka nka Vodun, nke nwere ememme kwa afọ.
A dọrọ ya aka ná ntị na nwa ya nwoke Lionel Pede na-anwa ire ọrụ nna ya site na Facebook
Lionel anaghị eziga ihe ndị ahụ wee zuo ego n'aka onye zụrụ ya
Nke a bụ ahụmịhe onwe m, a na-ezube ozi ahụ iji dọọ ndị ọzọ aka ná ntị bụ ndị ọrụ nka ahụ dọtara.
